export-entities.name: ACTION/All Portal Action
export-entities.pql:
ID 31 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "ACTION/All Portal Action" = (UPLOAD OR DOWNLOAD OR ATTACH OR DELETE OR EXPORT OR MOVE OR OPEN OR EDIT)
